short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remembers previously schedule post date for x.com and adds dropdown incrementing buttons.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is really helpful for mass scheduling regular content on ğ•, save yourself hundreds of clicks!

Each time a select input is changed, the extension saves the value to Chrome's local storage. When a value is loaded upon entering the schedule modal, the select input is outlined in green.

When a select input is modified by the increment buttons, it is outlined in purple. 

Works on x.com and pro.x.com, however it works best for ğ• Pro when going straight to this url first: https://pro.x.com/compose/post/schedule (or reloading the page after clicking schedule).
